description:
Best Builder & Town Hall Bases with Links for the COC Clash of Clans Game

What are various types of Clash of Clans bases?

An important part of Clash of Clans is to design base layouts using various defense structures and buildings. Regardless of how much gold is put towards defenses, a badly built base will be readily attacked. A well-designed Clash of Clans base, on the other hand, will be able to defend better even if the defenses are weaker.

Are CoC base links Safe?

Clash BasePedia is 100% safe and it uses the official API provided by CoC game to copy paste the base layouts directly in game. Just click 'download link' and it automatically opens and copies the base layout DIRECTLY in CoC game!
name: clash of clans base
